Source: H. L. Brown, Energy Analysis of 108 Industrial Processes. The Fairmont Press, Inc., 1996.

C. Galitsky, E. Worrell, C. Galitsky, E. Masanet, and W. Graus, “Energy Efficiency Improvement and Cost Saving Opportunities for the Glass Industry. An ENERGY STAR Guide for Energy and Plant Managers,” LBNL-57335-Revision, 927883, Mar. 2008. doi: 10.2172/927883.
